quote: I do not have any family here in America. So any person that I would connect with, they would become at some point, my family.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the emotional journey and personal connection in real estate.
suggested_hook: Discover how turning clients into family can transform your real estate business.

quote: Hispanic buyers sometimes buy as a family... You need to talk with the mom, the dad, the cousin.
why_clipworthy: Provides specific cultural insights for serving Hispanic clients.
suggested_hook: Want to capture the Hispanic market? Here's what you need to know.
